DOC.brief_summary: This substudy Generation-100 study ( NCT01666340 ) . The aim study find critical value ( 1 ) maximal oxygen uptake ( 2 ) sedentary behavior , cardiovascular risk parameter cluster apparent elderly Norwegian population .
DOC.brief_title: Cardiovascular Risk Factors , Maximal Oxygen Uptake Sedentariness : Observational Study
